reviews.review: Tam bi bulmaca oyunu. Hikaye sever arkadaşlara şiddetle tavsiye ederim.  Ayrıca grafikler de bayağ iyi.

best puzzle game you will play in your life 
play it with your friends

This is one of the only games, if not THE only game, that I would consider to be a perfect 10/10. I've had this on my Xbox since it came out, and have logged many hours on it. I've had a lot of good memories in this game, so I'm happy I got it on Steam. 

Halls of Science 4 is my favorite song on the soundtrack.
um dos melhores jogos de puzzle na minha opinião.

Eu recomendo o jogo, mas eu recomendo comprar quando tem promoção que fica por 3 reais e pouco pois não vale a pena pagar mais de 30 reais num jogo que tem muita pouca fase, mas em geral o jogo é legal.
La verdad el uno se me hizo que fue un juego perfecto pero algo corto, este es mas largo por si te quedas con ganas despues de jugar portal :v
Muazzam

Είναι και στο όνομα: Portal 2. Η συνέχεια του πρώτου Portal με πολύ περισσότερα και δυσκολότερα παζλς ειδικά προς το τέλος. Αν είσαστε φανατικός τέτοιων παιχνιδιών-παζλ είναι ότι πρέπει! Το τέλος ειδικά τα σπάει! Καλές πύλες!

¡WoooooooooW! ¡Woooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooow!
Este juego es magnifico, tiene una gran historia, puzzles increibles y estupenda jugabilidad.
Los personajes (aunque son pocos, pero los justos), son innolvidables, y poniendole ese toque de comedia del que no podia evitar reirme a cada rato.
Aun no he jugado el modo Coop, pero por lo menos el individual es simplemente perfecto.
Como siempre Valve dandonos muestras de lo que es hacer buenos juegos.

One of the best games I've ever played by far. Complete the original before to get to know the story first, because it is amazing, just like the gameplay. Seriously, it's a must buy, and it's excellent even today. It even looks fairly good for today's standards, so don't hesitate in buying the 2-pack when you see a discount (discounts are really big, but it's worth it anyways)

After replaying the game for the almost millionth time I can tell you without a shadow of a doubt this game is a recomendation the comedy it on point and the singleplayer is more than three times as long as the first game's
this game has a co op mode as well which is entertaining with a friend and has some mind bending puzzles 
and if you have played both of these modes well play them again because they are that good then look at the workshop the community behind this game is still going on and we still love this game and are still making our own custom chambers and people even use more than just the tools that are given in the chamber builder you're given 
this game is a masterpeice and is worth all the money right now it's $2.19 because of the steam sale 
but normally the game is around $20 and to me it's worth the full price of any AAA game because it just has that much replay value more than you could ever get from Call Of Duty or Destiny 
because this game has heart put into it  
it has memorable characters and a sci fi tale you'll be wanting to share with your grandchildren if you haven't played this game PLAY IT 
if you have played this game and you're deciding whether to gift it to a friend or not
DO IT this is the best of the best of gaming and you will not regret it 
the music and sound design is on point 
you remember every little sound effect that just tells you how much personality this game has 
this is a masterpiece 
there is a part in the campaign that might seem like it drags on for some but it's worthwile to play to get those lore tidbits
Wonderful writing, great puzzle design, and Stephen Merchant's voice. All good things. Great game.

Single-Player: Amazing
Co-Op: Cream Jort

The games sense of humor is amazing, cracking sarcasm and dark humor around every corner. The gameplay makes you feel like a genius whenever you figure something out by yourself.
Is nice, definitely worth picking up considering it goes on sale every 2 seconds.

Un juego de puzles en primera persona pero con una historia super envolvente. No es un juego de puzles más, si le dedicas 10 minutos le dedicaras los necesarios para terminarlo. Simplemente imprescindible.

Dit spel is geweldig. Het enige probleem dat ik ermee heb is dat de single-player mode wel langer mocht zijn, maar met de coop mode en de testkamers gemaakt door andere spelers maakt dit eigenlijk niet zoveel uit. Als je Portal 2 nog niet gespeeld hebt wat doe je dan nog? Speel het! Je hoeft niet per se Portal 1 te hebben gespeeld dus waar wacht je op
Игр топ

Artılar:

+Oyun co-op olabiliyor ve her manada co-op oynanmaya değer.
+Eğer zaman öldürmek veya kafa dağıtmak istiyorsanız harika bir seçenek OLABİLİYOR...
+Cidden zekanızı çalıştırıyor ve bölüm geçtiğinizde size bir ödül vermese de kendinizi ödüllenmiş gibi harika hissediyorsunuz.

Eksiler:

-Senaryo KİMİ ZAMAN çekici değil...
-Oyunu tek oynayacaksanız pek sarmıyor.
-Oyun bazen gereksiz şekilde kasıyor nedenini çözemedim(ani fps dropları şeklinde).

Eklemek istediklerim:

Eğer çok ucuza bulursanız alın ve eğer arkadaşınız varsa oynayabileceğiniz süper bir seçenek.

Это просто бомба в игровой индустрии! Графика на ультрах ну очень прияная. Все очень атмосверно. Но единсвенное что это то что порой не найдешь куда поставить портал. Концовка была очень неожиданная! Щас будет спойлер! И очень понравилась [spoiler]песня турелей :D[/spoiler]
 Побольше бы таких игр!
     Моя оценка 9.6 / 10

This game has always been my No. 1 favorite game from the moment I got it. It has such an amazing story mixed with fun and challenging gameplay focused around puzzle mechanics. You definitely did not need to play the first game to understand what is going on, it is all summarized in the first moments playing. I doesn't matter what price you get this game for, any price is a great price for a game this amazing. This is a game you need to have, it is filled with so many great characters, has a great soundtrack, and has a great story.
Short history but very funny, all of the puzzles are very well designed. 10/10
Gostei muito, já tinha zerado o 1, fiquei de zerar esse, levei umas 9 horas pra terminar, seria incrível uma continuação!!! Um dos melhores games que ja joguei do estilo!!

我是打折的时候入的只花了6块  真是超值！！！
传送门一代还有二代我都通关了而且通了相当多次，可以说根本玩不够啊！！剧情方面也做得很有深意不过我就不在这里剧透了。
二代比起一代多了联机模式终于可以和好基友一起互坑了，这游戏还有创意工坊自带中文虽然是老游戏了，不过到现在为止也还有很多人玩因为一直有新的地图在更新，还有一些作者搞出了跑酷地图脑洞也是可以的（强行玩成动作游戏）当然也有一些恶意满满的作者，被人坑完觉得不爽也可以自己制作地图放上去报复社会。这游戏多人和单人是两个游戏，因为智商不够害死队友明明很简单就是死都过不去。因为队友的一次失误又要重新再来！都让这个游戏的乐趣大大提升，如果找不到基友的孩子欢迎加入一起联机。

Steam群：162640021

Magnífico juego, tiene una perfecta y facil jugabilidad, una buena curva de dificultad, y una narradora robótica que te saca unas cuantas risas mientras jugas Portal2, aunque a veces sea desquiciante algún nivel, todo lo que tienes que hacer es ingeniartelas con tu pistola de portales. El juego tiene muy buenos gráficos y es muy limpio en todo lo que hace, por ejemplo, cuando te teletransportas de un portal a otro, muchas veces te olvidas de que acabas de pasar por un portal, porque realmente parece que hayas seguido una linea recta andando, nada de lag ni mala optimización ni bugs. Recomendable 100%.
Simply put a great game. One of the all time greats.

Otimo jogo

W te święta skorzystałem z promocji i kupiłem tą grę za 7,19zł. Wcześniej tylko o niej słyszałem, ale dzisiaj po kilku godzinach rozgrywki uważam, że jest naprawdę fajna. Gra słada się z ciągłych zagadek logicznych, które staramy się sami rozwiązać. Gra uczy wykorzysywania otoczenia oraz wykorzystywania przeróżnych zjawisk fizycznych. Bardzo podoba mi się również głos podkładany przez Stephena Merchanta nijakiemu Wheatley'owi , który w swoim żartobliwym stylu tworzy atmosferę fabuły w kamapani singleplayer. Portal 2 umożliwia rownież grę w kooperacji, co jest stanowi zupełnie nową kampanię. Polecam :)
galera, to comentando pra ganhar conquista

个人认为是我遇见过最优秀的作品之一。

高中时被别人推荐了这款游戏，看过介绍后立刻去下载了（盗版）来玩，通关后意犹未尽，又去把前作也找来通了，两部加起来一共用了16小时左右。下午开始玩，天黑了连开灯的功夫都没有，家人还以为我一直在睡觉。第一次迫不及待地想要完成一部游戏，一关过后马不停蹄地进入下一关，一直到第二天天亮。

上大学后补个档，然后又和室友马不停蹄地玩完了双人模式。依然很爽快，不过居然觉得比高中时老了，脑子转不过来了（？）

总的来说，作为一部构思相对精巧，谜题难度较适中，偶尔需要一丢丢操作的解谜作品，值得解谜爱好者和它共度[strike]春[/strike]良宵。
